admin/storefront-permissions.tab.users.e: Errore durante il salvataggio delle informazioni B2B
admin/storefront-permissions.title: Permessi del negozio
admin/storefront-permissions.alert-pick: È necessario scegliere un centro di costo prima di salvare le modifiche
admin/storefront-permissions.help.title: How it works
admin/storefront-permissions.help.text1: Role Names can be renamed, but categories are fixed.
admin/storefront-permissions.help.catego: Can manage quotations, sales, and users from their Organization.
It can have different access levels.
Can belong to one or many organizations.
Sales users can only manage Sales roles.
Sales user hierarchy: sales-admin > sales-manager > sales-representative
Have access and can manage their own organization.
Customers users can only manage users under the Customers roles.
Customers users hierarchy: customer-admin > customer-approver > customer-buyer
